enhanced_description: Growing People offers a comprehensive HR solution designed for start-ups, early-stage, and SME companies. It specializes in complete people management, assisting businesses with critical HR processes from talent acquisition and employee onboarding to ongoing internal operations. The service covers a wide spectrum of HR functions including HR document management, attendance and leave management, employee engagement and retention strategies, performance appraisal, training, compensation & benefits administration, and employee separation, aiming to be a one-stop HR partner for growing organizations.
